title: Hero MotoCorp commences delivery of e-scooter VIDA V1 in Jaipur
description: Hero MotoCorp on Sunday said it has commenced deliveries of its electric scooter VIDA V1 in Jaipur with plans to introduce the brand in many other locations this year. The country's largest two-wheeler maker had earlier commenced deliveries of the model in Bengaluru.
